page.content: {Knutsford Road Methodist Church}is 85 years old. All the floor and ceiling has been replaced recently because of dry rot. Two more rooms have been built. An old storeroom has been turned into a Sunday School room. The alteration is costing Â£37,000. Before its alteration it held 180 people but it is now hoped it will hold 200. In the last 5 years Focus Club, a Fellowship Club and choir have been formed. The Reverend I. Hall believes that the church is for 3 things: {To worship God, To tell people, all {people, the good news of how God cares {for them, To serve people in any way {possible.} There is one thing all 3 churches agree to: the church plays an important role in the everyday life of Holmes Chapel.
